summary:
Skyrim Facelifts: Followers UTHGERD THE UNBROKEN Edition
A facelift for follower Uthgerd the Unbroken, with three version available.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][size=3]:UPDATE 9/30/2016:[/size][/u][/b]
A couple years late, but I'm going to be working on fixing up this mod (as well as my others) to rid it of all the errors that others had been reporting and maybe touch up the face lifts a bit to match a higher quality than the original files possessed.
Thank you guys so much for your support. I never expected to get so many endorsements for my silly little mods. Hopefully I can get these face lifts up to a quality that is worthy of your time.
Thanks again!
~RavenSylphe
[center]_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/33706-2-1363934039.png[/img]
[heading][i][center]"Want to hear a little Nord wisdom? You don't really know a woman 'til you've had a strong drink and a fistfight with her."[/center][/i][/heading]
Looking around Nexus, I was sad and kinda disgusted to see so many 'pretty' mods for Uthgerd. I mean, whatever floats your boat and all, but, in my opinion, none of them really fit her voice or her personality. Uthgerd is a strong woman, a warrior who won\'t take shit from no one, and I wanted to reflect that part of her in a younger look. So, ta-da! This facelift was born in a matter of hours.
Now along with the younger face versions, I also created sub versions that have the older face texture, for those who wish to keep her default age look.
I was originally going to include version with warpaint, for those who would want them, but I couldn't find any that looked good or really fit her, so I scrapped that idea. Maybe I'll try again later if that is what people would like to see.

[b][size=3]REQUIREMENTS:
[list]
[*]Versions 1 and 2 require no extra files.
[*]Version 3 requires [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25395] Mackoms Lore Style Hair set [/url]
[/list][/size][/b]
[size=3][b]MODS USED:[/b][/size]
[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869]Covereyes [/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28645]Nuska Real Skin for Women [/url](Mod no longer available)
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3574]Gizmodian Scars [/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909]aMidianBorn Book of Silence by CaBaL [/url]
[/list]
[b][size=3]INSTALLATION[/size][/b]
[list]
[*]Install : Use NMM or extract the files into the skyrim root folder manually. Make sure that the .esp is below mods that affect followers such as UFO
[*]Uninstall : Use NMM or delete all of the files manually.
[/list]
[b][size=3]COMPATIBILITY[/size][/b]
My facelifts should be compatible with all mods, including follower overhauls, face/skin textures, etc, etc. Just be sure to place the .esp at the end of the load order after all other companion mods.

[b][size=3]REVIEWS:

[/size][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t01HcJaGVpA]Skyrim NPC Facelifts - SKyrim Mod Skit[/url][/b]
Video by [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPTlLPK6Exy13XLCHDJIeyw]ATTAYA[/url]
[youtube]t01HcJaGVpA[/youtube]
author: RavenSylphe
